json: {"Date":"2026-02-12T22:00:00.000Z","Title":"Oil Prices Steady Ahead of US-Ukraine Peace Talks","Article Text":"The anticipation surrounding the Trump-Zelenskiy meeting echoes past moments when major geopolitical negotiations directly influenced oil markets, such as during U.S.-Iran talks or OPEC summits. Much like the 1973 oil crisis after Middle East tensions, todayâ€™s careful market reaction shows how peace or escalation in Eastern Europe could swiftly impact supply chains and energy prices. If a peace deal materializes, it may stabilize or even lower oil prices by removing risk premiums, potentially revitalizing European economies and global trade.
